Text: Thought this would be a load of games for the Amiga. It's just the kickstart roms...

these are a bitch to get hold of thanks syn

yeah voo if your after games get emule and get on the razorback server...theres tons of amiga game zips on there..check it out
Amiga never used "roms" for anything but the kickstarts. the "adf" files, is diskettes ripped sector by sector into files, muchly like ISO-images
